title: Set sail in the Atlantis Coast with One&Only Cape Town - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Set sail in the Atlantis Coast with One&Only Cape Town Published on : Wednesday, August 12, 2015
One&Only Cape Town offers unforgettable venues for perfect evenings. Moored in the Waterfront Marina, a Catamaran accommodating up to 35 passengers or a motorised yacht accommodating up to 20 passengers is available for one hour, three hours or day trips. Departing from the Marina, the guest can cruise along the Atlantic Coast with the dolphins, and drop anchor in the still waters of Clifton Beach. Lazing on sun beds or diving into the ocean for a cooling experience, guests can enjoy a beautiful day in the Cape Town waters.
One can select the Sunset Cruise and sip on French Champagne while enjoying the culinary delights prepared by One&Only Cape Townâ€™s chefs, watching the sun go down. The guests can leave earlier and take a cruise round Robben Island.
For an intimate wedding shared with only close friends and relatives on one of these vessels, the personalized wedding consultant of One&Only Cape Town will tailor make the special day, making it an unforgettable one.
